titleStmt.title: Prologue design'd for the last new farce, call'd The Fool's expectation, or, The Wheel of fortune acted at the Theatre Royal in Dorset Gardens.

notesStmt.note: "A satire on lotteries, especially government lotteries, and Elkanah Settle"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
